title: Tales of the Lewd, Nude, Rude, and Crude: Volume Three: Three Hours
description: Look, this is some funny crap making fun of sex and sexuality but it is not worth it unless you have that Kindle Unlimited thing going. I promise. I'm the author, I know I'm not supposed to rag on myself but I don't want people to say Ol' Goodtimes is a cheat. Honey, get the free trial.
author: Desiree Goodtimes
